sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './FeaturedMovie.css' export default ({item}) => { console.log(item) let firstDate = new Date(item.first_air_date) let genres = [] for(let i in item.genres) { genres.push(item.genres[i].name) } let description = item = item.overview if (description.lenght > 2){ description = description.substring(0, 2 + '...') } return(
{item.original_name}
{item.vote_average} pontos
{firstDate.getFullYear()}
{item.number_of_seasons} temporada{item.number_of_seasons !== 1 ? 's' : ''}
{description}
▶ Assistir + Minha Lista
Gêneros:{genres.join()}
) }
